title: Evil (2005, Greek zombie film, english subs) <<GreekMafia>>
description:
Plot:

Zombies in Greece! Yorgos Noussias directs the (purportedly) first Greek zombie flick and makes up for lost time with oodles of flesh-eaters running amok in downtown Athens. A tough-talking cabbie, a teenage beauty and others of the still-living must combat the evil hordes trying to devour them. Combining genuine humor with relentless gore, exploding heads and buckets of blood, this is one zombie fest that doesn&#039;t disappoint.
